title: BMC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 25 Surveillnace Investigator Posts
description: The Brihan Mumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 25 Surveillance Investigator Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass can apply for the BMC Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode.
